Name: Don't Cheat On Me
About the game: Donâ€™t Cheat on me is a multiplayer game where players play as the Husband, the Wife or the Neighbour to try to dominate this marriage. Features A cheating story with three players. Multiple maps, each with unique gameplay. Three character types to play as, each with unique skillsets. Different props with different combats and combos. Wife and Neighbour will have special interactions to increase intimacy. Lots of places to hide, characters even got a special skill to hide themselves. Randomized game setup for extra replayability. Win the game alone or collaborate with each other, lots of possibilities. Husband The Husband needs to catch Wife and Neighbour. He owns powerful weapons and skillsets. Any close contact between Wife and Neighbour will increase his power. Wife The Wife needs to get things done and escape. A good collaboration between her and Neighbour will make them stronger. Her ability will be entirely different if used on Husband or Neighbour. Neighbour The Neighbour has to finish his jobs and escape. Use in-game props and your taunt skillsets to better hide and fight back. Also, collaboration is the key.
